name: Ryan Bang
description: '''Bang Hyun-sung''' ({{ko-hhrm|방현성|方縣成}}; born 16 June 1991), professionally known as '''Ryan Bang''', is a [[South Korea|South Korean]] host, comedian, actor, singer, and vlogger based in the [[Philippines]]. Bang is one of a few Korean [[expatriate]]s to appear in Philippine television; other expatriates are [[Sandara Park]], [[Sam Oh]] and [[Grace Lee]]. He rose to fame in the Philippines through the reality show ''[[Pinoy Big Brother: Teen Clash 2010]]'', where he was first runner-up behind eventual winner [[James Reid (actor)|James Reid]]. He was the host of his first show ''3ow Powhz!'', which aired on [[Studio 23]] from 2010 to 2011. A former guest judge on the [[ABS-CBN]] variety show ''[[It's Showtime (Philippine TV program)|It's Showtime]]'', Bang became one of the regular hosts since 2012. He is the main host of reality show ''[[Dream Maker (TV program)|Dream Maker]]''.
